name: The Piano Woman
description:
A young programmer made an interactive game for a competition. In fact, he made it too interactive. A friend is going to test it.

 But what does all this have to do with "The Piano Woman"?

Consider before playing
  • The game has sounds and lights that may be disturbing to some people
  • Jumpscares
  • You might find some spelling mistakes. English is not our native language. Sorry.

Twitter | Instagram | Discord |

The Piano Woman is a short interactive visual novel. You are the teacher of a girl who is very good at playing the piano, in fact, you will accompany her to the first concert.

This girl is becoming increasingly famous thanks to social media, and some record labels want to sign her because they find that she is a natural-born talent.

Oh yes, you should know that the main character, i.e., the teacher, is male.

Am I not forgetting anything else? My buddy didn't tell me anything else so... Yeah, the description is ready.
